rooms.description: A welcoming space with wheelchair accessible design, including ramps and tactile flooring. The entrance is oriented towards the East for positive Vastu energy.

Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing the West for natural light while balancing Vastu principles by providing east-west orientation. Includes open-plan layout for wheelchair accessibility.
A separate dining space adjacent to the living room with easy access and wide doors for wheelchair users.

Modern kitchen integrated within the open layout; designed with accessible work surfaces and floor-to-ceiling windows on one side. The placement adheres to Vastu guidelines by orienting the stove towards the South.
Large bedroom featuring a walk-in closet, en-suite bathroom with wheelchair access, and floor-to-ceiling windows for ample daylight. Oriented to the Northeast for positive energy.
Secondary bedroom designed for privacy and accessibility; includes wide doorways and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.
Additional bedroom with wheelchair-accessible features such as grab bars in the bathroom and easy access to common areas.
A central ensuite bathroom accessible from multiple rooms, featuring non-slip floors and grab rails for safety. Designed with Vastu orientation in mind.
Functional space with floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light; designed as a quiet retreat while remaining wheelchair accessible.

features: Two-car garage with wide ramps for accessibility

openings.location: Upper level access point from living area
features: Staircase with handrails and non-slip treads

additional_features.vastu_compliance: Design respects traditional Vastu principles by orienting key spaces appropriately, including the main entrance towards the East, bedrooms in the Northeast, and kitchen positioned with stove facing South.
additional_features.wheelchair_accessibility: All rooms and circulation paths are designed with wide doorways (minimum 36 inches), ramps, non-slip surfaces, handrails and tactile flooring where necessary.
additional_features.roof Terrace: Features an open rooftop terrace accessible via a stairwell with safety features, providing a serene relaxation space with panoramic views.
